oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Entrance to Christian Brothers University
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bell Tower; Arches; Kenrick Hall; Barry Hall (Administration Building)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This view of the entrance to the CBU campus shows the renovated Bell Tower, Kenrick and Barry Hall. The entrance itself was redesigned as well, with fencing incorporating the French rabat from the Brothers' collar.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Nixon, Ferguson, and Wolfe, Inc., renovated Bell Tower
